sentences.en: A sudden attack of typhoid cut him off in the prime of his life.
sentences.cn: 伤寒突然发作,使他年纪轻轻就被夺去了生命.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Reinforce community student's community patients'nurse, prevent typhoid propagation and extend.
sentences.cn: 结论: 加强群体学生病人的护理, 防止伤寒病的传播与蔓延.

sentences.en: Everyone who is going abroad will need to be immunised against typhoid.
sentences.cn: 准备出国者均需注射伤寒预防针.

sentences.en: Got typhoid fever to those treat a method excuse me?
sentences.cn: 请问得了伤寒有那些治疗方法?

sentences.en: He became deaf at five after an attack of typhoid fever.
sentences.cn: 他五岁时候,生了一场伤寒,变成了聋子.

sentences.en: He is very low with typhoid.
I had a bad reaction after my typhoid injection.
sentences.cn: 我注射伤寒针剂后产生了不良反应.

sentences.en: Many people agree typhoid Mary is not a type of su - perstition.
sentences.cn: 许多人相信伤寒玛丽不是一种迷信.

sentences.en: My mother came down with typhoid fever and spent the entire trip's infirmary.
sentences.cn: 我的母亲染上了伤寒,整旅程中都躺在船上的医疗室.

sentences.en: Objective: Explore the patients of student's community typhoid nurse management.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨群体学生伤寒病人的护理管理.

sentences.en: Painful typhoid injections are a thing of the past, thanks to the introduction of an oral vaccine.
sentences.cn: 自从发明了口服疫苗后，令人痛苦的伤寒疫苗注射就成为了过去。

sentences.en: To investigate a fast way of diagnosing typhoid, paratyphoid and typhus with serology agglutinating method.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨一种诊断伤寒、副伤寒、斑疹伤寒的快速血清学凝集法。

sentences.en: Typhoid fever sneaks in when sanitation fails.
sentences.cn: 环境卫生搞不好,伤寒就会乘虚而入.

sentences.en: Typhoid is an example of a notifiable disease.
sentences.cn: 伤寒是必须报告卫生当局的病例.

phrases.tran_cn: 伤寒玛丽（伤寒带菌者）；坏事传播者

trans.tran_en: a serious infectious disease that is caused by dirty food or drink
